text: @MarkRuffalo @realDonaldTrump The virus is from China. Origin? Wuhan! That is established fact based on all we know. Only liberals are hung up on equating a reference to a geographical location as some sort of hatred of Chinese people. The rest of us are over the race-baiting nonsense. God bless us ALL! 🇺🇸
